text: Kerosene is a type of fuel, but it can also refer to: * power kerosene; see tractor vaporising oil. * a lubricant; see mineral oil. * a song by Bad Religion from their album Recipe for Hate. * a song by Big Black from their album Atomizer. * a song by The Bottle Rockets. * a song by Crystal Castles, from their album (III). * Kerosene (album), the debut album of Miranda Lambert. :*"Kerosene" (song), the title track to this album * a novel written by Chris Wooding ==See also== * Paraffin (disambiguation) * Kerosene lamp * Pressurised-burner stoves * Naphtha
title: Kerosene (disambiguation)
